summary: Small farm player home near Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://fs2.directupload.net/images/150103/ptkz4aoo.jpg[/img]

The small farm house player home. It's near Whiterun, between the [color=#459B0B][b]Pelagia Farm[/b][/color] and the [color=#459B0B][b]Western Watchtower[/b][/color].

[color=#459B0B][size=30][b][i]Requires:[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[list][*] Skyrim (Vers. 1.9.32.0)[*] Hearthfire[*] [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][/list]

[color=#459B0B][size=30][b][i]Assets:[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[list][*]1 Bed[*]1 Cooking Pot[*]1 Oven[*]1 Entchating Table[*]1 Alchemy Table[*]1 Cupbord[*]1 Dresser[*]1 Strongbox[*]1 Chest[*]some barrels and sacks for storage too.[*]1 Cow[*]1 Chicken[*]19 Planters [/list]

[img]http://fs1.directupload.net/images/150103/ayo62l9o.jpg[/img]

[i]You find [color=#459B0B][b]outside the house[/b][/color] a small table with the Journal and the [color=#459B0B][b]Key for Heimalingur[/b][/color].[/i]

This is my first mod so if anything doesn't work pm me I'll try to fix and update it.
___________________________
[color=#459B0B][size=30][b][i]Highly recommended mods:[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25239/?]Berts Hearthfire Dairy Goods Upgrade by berticus0001[/url] [b]
So you can milk the Cow.
[/b][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26851/?]More plants and recipes for Hearthfire including Dawnguard and Dragonborn plants by Rowan[/url][b]
So you will be able to plant stuff like apples, tomatoes, etc...[/b][/list]

___________________________

[color=#459B0B][size=30][b][i]How to Install manually:[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[list=1]
[*]Extract the esp file to our data folder
[*] Activate the plugin in the Launcher.
[*] Start your game.
[/list]
Done!
-------

[color=#459B0B][size=30][b][i]How to Unistall:[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[list=1]
[*]Take all your stored stuff from the storages and save.
[*]Shut down your game and got to your Data folder.
[*]Delete the "Heimalingur.esp" file from your folder.
[/list]
Done!




[color=#459B0B][size=30]Have fun and enjoy.[/size][/color]
author: finnleanne
